resources.string: If you reject permission, you cannot use this service. Please turn on permissions in settings.
Thank you for using this app! It is a Seoul tour guide app.\nI\'m sure it will be a great help if you use this app while traveling to Seoul.
"Seoullo" has various functions.\nThere are travel destinations and restaurants that will remain memorable if you go, and maps and translations to go there.
Now start a happy tour of Seoul with "Seoullo"!
